game.name: Shrouded Siege
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A maze-building, roguelike, tower defense designed from the ground up to be a great solo or co-op experience. Each Irish mythology-inspired campaign is unique, with unending combinations of upgrades to combine, and each battle is filled with unique and randomized tactical challenges to overcome.
